metadata.title: CVE-2016-9896 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free while manipulating the "navigator" object within WebVR.Note: WebVR is not currently enabled by default. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 50.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9896` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 50.1.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 50.1.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 50.1.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 50.1.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '50.1.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
